item.title: The Most Read Books on Goodreads in September 2025
item.description: Here were the five most-read books on Goodreads last month! These are the buzziest books of the moment, from historical fiction to thrillers.

item.title: What are You Reading in October?
item.description: What did you read in September? What's on your TBR for October? And which 2025 Read Harder Challenge tasks did you complete? Let's chat!

item.title: 8 of the Funniest Middle-Grade Fantasy Books
item.description: Here are 8 of the funniest middle grade fantasy books published in the past few years, with wit and wonder for all readers.

item.title: 5 Must-Read Appalachian Nonfiction Books of 2025
item.description: These must-read works of Appalachian nonfiction books of 2025 showcase the rich storytelling tradition of the region.

item.title: Obsessed with Social Media and Dissatisfied with Your Job? This is the Book for You!
item.description: Looking for an escape from our current capitalist hellscape? Beatriz Serrano's Discontent is not the novel for you.
